channel.title: I'm new at starting a server and i need help with a xlinescape server kit downlo
channel.description:
I need to know what I need to do....
Here is a list-
1. How to get the server to run, and to let other people play on it
2. How to get the port set
3. How to get to name of server changed
If you please can list the file name (if any) thats listed below that belongs to what # that I need help with above ty.... :|
I got all the normal download kit files from xlinescape 2.7 server kit
listed as follows
-Item -Item2.class -Item3 -Item3.class -Itemhandler.class -Itemhandler -ItemList.class -ItemList -itemspawnpoints.class -itemspawnpoints -misc.class -misc -npc.cfg -NPC.class -NPC -npcdrops.cfg -NPCDrops.class -NPCDrops -NPCHandler.class -NPCHandler -NPCList.class -NPCList -ObjectHandler.class -ObjectHandler -Player.class -Player -PlayerHandler.class -PlayerHandler -PlayerSave.class -PlayerSave -runserver -SaveGameHandler.class -SaveGameHandler -server.class -server -ShopHandler.class -ShopHandler -shops.cfg -stream.class -Teleport.cfg -Thumbs -Voule
I don't know if I'm Doing this right lol, this my first server to ever make :|
This is what i want to server name to look like---- m1dn1ghtclub3scape.no-ip.info(or org, biz)

item.source: I'm new at starting a server and i need help with a xlinescape server kit downlo

item.title: I'm new at starting a server and i need help with a xlinescape server kit downlo
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

  1. How to get the server to run, and to let other people play on it-Go to “compile.bat” in your source folder, and edit it, use the ‘Perfect’ Compiler 1.9, or it might be in it. Press C then enter, it checks all the files to make sure it found no errors, once it’s done, hit a key, then hit R and enter to run it.

  2. How to get the port set-When you run it, it’ll show like "XlineScape starting on 0.0.0.0:43594, the last numbers “43594” are the port, if it doesn’t show, go into server.java and search for “port =”

  3. How to get to name of server changed-Go into source folder, open client.java, and press CTRL H, and put in the box to find XlineScape 2.7 or w/e it is, then in the bottom, to replace it, put in your server name, and hit “replace all”

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm new at starting a server and i need help with a xlinescape server kit downlo
